name: RAMANUJAN EDUCATION & RESEARCH FOUNDATION, FARIDABAD
briefDescription: We are a Rehabilitation & Skill Development Center located in one of the underdeveloped districts of South Haryana that happens to be in the proximity of Delhi and NCR. Where, we are running a ‘facility center’ to provide specific therapies, training and education to children with special needs since 2013. We are registered with District Administration Palwal under PWD Certificate no. 017/DSWO dated 18/04/2016.  While, doing so we are also imparting vocational & computer training, that they are capable of learning. So, that, they can earn their livelihood and live independently. Further, we also intend to train rural women and provide them with employment. By helping them.
